lyrics_abstract:
High on the hill with the lonely goatherd
Lay odl lay odl lay he hoo
Yodel back with the girl and goatherd
Lay odl lay odl oh.

Wind it up, wind it up, wind it up!
Odl lay odl lay odl-oo.

Yeah.

This is the key that makes us wind up
When the beat comes on, the girls all line up
And the boys al[...]
